original_text: And when Moab presents himself, when he wearies himself on the high place, when he comes to his sanctuary to pray, he will not prevail.
korean_text: 모압이 그 산당에서 피곤하도록 봉사하며 자기 성소에 나아가서 기도할지라도 소용없으리로다

sentences.original_text: when he wearies himself on the high place
when he comes to his sanctuary to pray
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 기도하려고 자기 성소에 나아올 때
